::Killfest/Darkmouse::

Without giving any external sign of doing so, Killfest's comm replies 
to DrillBit's message.

"My team and I are always ready for combat. If the bots attack, we'll 
be there," the reply read.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse shruggs. "I don't really know. They said that energon blood 
was flowing through my veins, so I guess that's the reason."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He still waited for a reply about Dark Mouse, so he dicided to go 
> see
> > her and Dollen. He got up and walked to the mess hall. When he 
> arrived
> > he sat with them.
> > "I sent a comm message but I havn't gotten a reply."
> > He opens a comm to Killfest.
> > "We have a group of bots outside the volcano. They want Dark 
Mouse. 
> We
> > may have to enter combat. Stand by."
> > 
> > ::Dollen::
> > 
> > "What do they want with you, Dark Mouse?"
> > 
> > ::Demolition::
> > 
> > Demolition transformed to jet mode, and took off for Alliance 
> island.
> > He needed repairs.
